channel.title: international law firm on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in international law firm on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Addleshaw Goddard Logo
Addleshaw Goddard LLP is an international law firm headquartered in London, United Kingdom. It is structured as a LLP and has circa 1,300 lawyers including more than 300 partners in 17 offices located in Aberdeen, Doha, Dubai, Dublin, Edinburgh, Frankfurt, Glasgow, Hamburg, Hong Kong, Leeds, London, Luxembourg, Manchester, Munich, Muscat, Paris, Singapore and Tokyo. The firm advises FTSE 100 and other major companies across corporate, commercial, finance and project, real estate and litigation business divisions with specialist fields such as private capital; energy, financial services, health and life sciences, real estate, retail and consumer, construction and transport sectors; and has a strong interest in tech.
You can download theAddleshaw Goddardlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Addleshaw Goddard
item.description: Addleshaw Goddard LLP is an international law firm headquartered in London, United Kingdom. It is structured as a LLP and has circa 1,300 lawyers including more than 300 partners in 17 offices located in Aberdeen, Doha, Dubai, Dublin, Edinburgh, Frankfurt, Glasgow, Hamburg, Hong Kong, Leeds, London, Luxembourg, Manchester, Munich, Muscat, Paris, Singapore and Tokyo. The firm advises FTSE 100 and other major companies across corporate, commercial, finance and project, real estate and litigation business divisions with specialist fields such as private capital; energy, financial services, health and life sciences, real estate, retail and consumer, construction and transport sectors; and has a strong interest in tech.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Akin Gump Strauss Hauer & Feld Logo
Akin Gump Strauss Hauer & Feld LLP, headquartered in Washington, D.C., is an international law firm and the largest lobbying firm in the United States by revenue. Akin Gump been consistently ranked as among the top law firms in the United States by The American Lawyer. The firm is known for its influence on Capitol Hill and its representation of high-profile clients. With regard to compensation, Akin Gump is ranked by associates as one of the top 10 highest-paying law firms in the country.
You can download theAkin Gumplogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Akin Gump
item.description: Akin Gump Strauss Hauer & Feld LLP, headquartered in Washington, D.C., is an international law firm and the largest lobbying firm in the United States by revenue. Akin Gump been consistently ranked as among the top law firms in the United States by The American Lawyer. The firm is known for its influence on Capitol Hill and its representation of high-profile clients. With regard to compensation, Akin Gump is ranked by associates as one of the top 10 highest-paying law firms in the country.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Alston and Bird Logo
Alston & Bird LLP is an international law firm with over 800 lawyers in 13 offices throughout the United States, Europe, the UK, and Asia. The firm provides legal services to both domestic and international clients who conduct business worldwide. Alston & Bird has advised companies including Amazon.com, The Coca-Cola Company, Microsoft, Bank of America, Starbucks, Toyota, Dell, UPS, and Nokia. Since 2000, Fortune has ranked the firm in the 100 Best Companies to Work For list.
You can download theAlston and Birdlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Alston and Bird
item.description: Alston & Bird LLP is an international law firm with over 800 lawyers in 13 offices throughout the United States, Europe, the UK, and Asia. The firm provides legal services to both domestic and international clients who conduct business worldwide. Alston & Bird has advised companies including Amazon.com, The Coca-Cola Company, Microsoft, Bank of America, Starbucks, Toyota, Dell, UPS, and Nokia. Since 2000, Fortune has ranked the firm in the 100 Best Companies to Work For list.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Berwin Leighton Paisner Logo Berwin Leighton Paisner was an international law firm with 14 offices across 10 countries globally, specializing in real estate, finance, litigation and corporate risk, private wealth and tax. In 2018, Bryan Cave merged with Berwin Leighton Painser to create Bryan Cave Leighton Paisner LLP, led by Lisa Mayhew and Therese Pritchard. Source
You can download theBerwin Leighton Paisnerlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Berwin Leighton Paisner

In 2018, Bryan Cave merged with Berwin Leighton Painser to create Bryan Cave Leighton Paisner LLP, led by Lisa Mayhew and Therese Pritchard. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Blake, Cassels & Graydon Logo
Blake, Cassels & Graydon LLP is an international corporate law firm with offices in Montreal, Ottawa, Toronto, Calgary, Vancouver, New York City, and London. It has the strongest law firm brand in Canada according to the 2019 Acritas survey. It is a charter member in Lex Mundi, a referral network of independent law firms. Blakes is also an advisory member of TechLaw Group, Inc. Since 2009, the Chair of Blakes is Brock Gibson, and Bryson Stokes is the new Firm Managing Partner.
You can download theBlakelogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Blake
item.description: Blake, Cassels & Graydon LLP is an international corporate law firm with offices in Montreal, Ottawa, Toronto, Calgary, Vancouver, New York City, and London. It has the strongest law firm brand in Canada according to the 2019 Acritas survey. It is a charter member in Lex Mundi, a referral network of independent law firms. Blakes is also an advisory member of TechLaw Group, Inc. Since 2009, the Chair of Blakes is Brock Gibson, and Bryson Stokes is the new Firm Managing Partner.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Bryan Cave Leighton Paisner Logo
Bryan Cave Leighton Paisner LLP is an international law firm with 25 offices worldwide. Bryan Cave was Headquartered in St Louis, Missouri. Berwin Leighton Paisner was Headquartered in London. Bryan Cave was formerly known as King, Phillips & Stewart. In 2018, Bryan Cave merged with Berwin Leighton Paisner HQ in London to create Bryan Cave Leighton Paisner LLP. The new firm is led by co-chairs Lisa Mayhew and Steve Baumer.
You can download theBryan Cavelogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Bryan Cave
item.description: Bryan Cave Leighton Paisner LLP is an international law firm with 25 offices worldwide. Bryan Cave was Headquartered in St Louis, Missouri. Berwin Leighton Paisner was Headquartered in London. Bryan Cave was formerly known as King, Phillips & Stewart. In 2018, Bryan Cave merged with Berwin Leighton Paisner HQ in London to create Bryan Cave Leighton Paisner LLP. The new firm is led by co-chairs Lisa Mayhew and Steve Baumer.

Cahill Gordon & Reindel Logo Cahill Gordon & Reindel LLP is a New York-based international law firm with offices in New York, Washington, D.C. and London. The firm is prominent in the practice areas of capital markets and banking & finance. Source
You can download theCahill Gordonlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >

Cleary Gottlieb Steen & Hamilton Logo Cleary Gottlieb Steen & Hamilton LLP is an international white shoe law firm headquartered at One Liberty Plaza in New York City. It employs over 1,200 lawyers worldwide. Source

item.title: Cleary Gottlieb

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Clifford Chance Logo
Clifford Chance LLP is an international law firm headquartered in London, United Kingdom, and a member of the “Magic Circle,” a group of the most prestigious London-based multinational law firms. It ranks as one of top ten largest law firms in the world measured both by number of lawyers and revenue. In 2019-20, Clifford Chance had a total revenue of £1.803 billion, the highest of any firm in the Magic Circle, and profits per equity partner of £1.
You can download theClifford Chancelogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Clifford Chance
item.description: Clifford Chance LLP is an international law firm headquartered in London, United Kingdom, and a member of the “Magic Circle,” a group of the most prestigious London-based multinational law firms. It ranks as one of top ten largest law firms in the world measured both by number of lawyers and revenue. In 2019-20, Clifford Chance had a total revenue of £1.803 billion, the highest of any firm in the Magic Circle, and profits per equity partner of £1.

CMS (law firm) Logo CMS is an international law firm that offers legal and tax advisory services. It provides companies and organisations with advice on a full range of legal issues. CMS consists of 17 independent law firms with more than 70 offices worldwide. Source
You can download theCMSlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: CMS
item.description: CMS is an international law firm that offers legal and tax advisory services. It provides companies and organisations with advice on a full range of legal issues. CMS consists of 17 independent law firms with more than 70 offices worldwide. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Cozen O'Connor Logo
Cozen O’Connor P.C. is an international law firm based in Center City Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. The firm was ranked 74th on the AmLaw 100 Survey in 2021, 92nd on the Global 200, 1st in the nation in The American Lawyer in its Midlevel Associates Satisfaction Survey in 2017, and ranked 79th on the National Law Journal’s list of the 500 Largest American Law Firms in 2017. Although the firm was founded in 1970, it has pursued a strategy of aggressive growth, and has expanded to more than 665 lawyers in 25 cities across two continents.
You can download theCozenlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Cozen
item.description: Cozen O’Connor P.C. is an international law firm based in Center City Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. The firm was ranked 74th on the AmLaw 100 Survey in 2021, 92nd on the Global 200, 1st in the nation in The American Lawyer in its Midlevel Associates Satisfaction Survey in 2017, and ranked 79th on the National Law Journal’s list of the 500 Largest American Law Firms in 2017. Although the firm was founded in 1970, it has pursued a strategy of aggressive growth, and has expanded to more than 665 lawyers in 25 cities across two continents.

DAC Beachcroft Logo DAC Beachcroft LLP is an international law firm headquartered in London, United Kingdom. It has around 2,500 lawyers and professionals across the UK, Europe, Asia-Pacific, Latin America and North America. It provides a full-service claims, commercial, risk, advisory and transactional capability, primarily in health, insurance and real estate. Source
You can download theDAClogo on full-version of the page. ]] >

<! [CDATA[
Greenberg Traurig Logo
Greenberg Traurig is an international law firm founded in Miami, Florida, United States in 1967 by Larry J. Hoffman, Mel Greenberg and Robert H. Traurig. For the past three years, it has ranked n the AM Law 100 by gross revenue, and in the top 20 of the Global 200. The firm has 42 offices in the United States, Latin America, Europe, the Middle East and Asia, and approximately 2400 attorneys worldwide.
You can download theGreenberg Trauriglogo on full-version of the page.
]] >

The firm has 42 offices in the United States, Latin America, Europe, the Middle East and Asia, and approximately 2400 attorneys worldwide.

Haynes and Boone Logo Haynes and Boone, LLP is an international corporate law firm with offices in Texas, New York, California, Charlotte, Colorado, Illinois, Washington, D.C., Shanghai, London, and Mexico City. Haynes and Boone has its headquarters in the One Victory Park building in Victory Park Dallas, Texas. Source
You can download theHaynes and Boonelogo on full-version of the page. ]] >

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Herbert Smith Freehills Logo
Herbert Smith Freehills is an international law firm with headquarters in London, United Kingdom and Sydney, Australia. It was formed on 1 October 2012 by a merger between the United Kingdom-based Herbert Smith, then a member of the “Silver Circle” of leading UK law firms, and Freehills, one of the “Big Six” Australian law firms. As of 2018, it is the 29th largest law firm in the world by revenue.
You can download theHerbert Smith Freehillslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Herbert Smith Freehills
item.description: Herbert Smith Freehills is an international law firm with headquarters in London, United Kingdom and Sydney, Australia. It was formed on 1 October 2012 by a merger between the United Kingdom-based Herbert Smith, then a member of the “Silver Circle” of leading UK law firms, and Freehills, one of the “Big Six” Australian law firms. As of 2018, it is the 29th largest law firm in the world by revenue.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Ince Gordon Dadds Logo Ince Gordon Dadds is an international commercial law firm, focusing mainly on shipping, insurance, energy, aviation and trade, while offering a full commercial legal service. The firm is the result of a 2019 merger between Ince & Co and Gordon Dadds. Ince Gordon Dadds is part of The Ince Group plc. Source
You can download theIncelogo on full-version of the page. ]] >

item.description: Ince Gordon Dadds is an international commercial law firm, focusing mainly on shipping, insurance, energy, aviation and trade, while offering a full commercial legal service. The firm is the result of a 2019 merger between Ince & Co and Gordon Dadds. Ince Gordon Dadds is part of The Ince Group plc. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Jones Day Logo
Jones Day is an American international law firm. As of 2018, it was the fifth largest law firm in the U.S. and the 13th highest grossing law firm in the world. Originally headquartered in Cleveland, Ohio, Jones Day ranks first in both M&A league tables and the 2017 U.S. Law Firm Brand Index. Jones Day has represented over half of the companies in the Fortune 500, including Goldman Sachs, General Motors, McDonald’s, and Bridgestone.
You can download theJones Daylogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Jones Day
item.description: Jones Day is an American international law firm. As of 2018, it was the fifth largest law firm in the U.S. and the 13th highest grossing law firm in the world. Originally headquartered in Cleveland, Ohio, Jones Day ranks first in both M&A league tables and the 2017 U.S. Law Firm Brand Index. Jones Day has represented over half of the companies in the Fortune 500, including Goldman Sachs, General Motors, McDonald’s, and Bridgestone.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
King & Spalding Logo King & Spalding LLP is an American international corporate law firm that is headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia and with offices located in North America, Europe, and Asia. It has over 1,100 lawyers in 23 offices globally. It is Am Law 100, Global 30 and white-shoe firm. Source
You can download theKing and Spaldinglogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: King and Spalding
item.description: King & Spalding LLP is an American international corporate law firm that is headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia and with offices located in North America, Europe, and Asia. It has over 1,100 lawyers in 23 offices globally. It is Am Law 100, Global 30 and white-shoe firm. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Locke Lord Logo
Locke Lord LLP is an international law firm formed on October 2, 2007, after the combination of Texas-based Locke Liddell & Sapp PLLC and Lord Bissell & Brook LLP. The firm is headquartered in Dallas, Texas and changed its name to Locke Lord LLP on September 27, 2011. In May 2007, the management of both Locke Liddell & Sapp and Lord Bissell & Brook proposed a corporate merger. On September 12, 2007, the partnership of each firm approved the merger, effective October 2, 2007.
You can download theLocke Lordlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Locke Lord
item.description: Locke Lord LLP is an international law firm formed on October 2, 2007, after the combination of Texas-based Locke Liddell & Sapp PLLC and Lord Bissell & Brook LLP. The firm is headquartered in Dallas, Texas and changed its name to Locke Lord LLP on September 27, 2011. In May 2007, the management of both Locke Liddell & Sapp and Lord Bissell & Brook proposed a corporate merger. On September 12, 2007, the partnership of each firm approved the merger, effective October 2, 2007.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Loyens & Loeff Logo Loyens & Loeff N.V. is an international law and tax firm headquartered in Rotterdam. It has offices in the Netherlands, Belgium and Switzerland, as well as in major international financial centres. The firm has about 1.500 employees, including more than 800 tax and legal advisers. Source
You can download theLoyens and Loefflogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Loyens and Loeff
item.description: Loyens & Loeff N.V. is an international law and tax firm headquartered in Rotterdam. It has offices in the Netherlands, Belgium and Switzerland, as well as in major international financial centres. The firm has about 1.500 employees, including more than 800 tax and legal advisers. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 McDermott Will & Emery Logo
McDermott Will & Emery is an international law firm with a diversified business practice. The firm is one of the largest grossing law firms in the US and globally, and its lawyers represent a wide range of commercial, industrial and financial enterprises, both publicly and privately held. The firm consists of multiple legal entities that are coordinated through service agreements: McDermott Will & Emery LLP, McDermott Will & Emery AARPI, McDermott Will & Emery Belgium LLP, McDermott Will & Emery Rechtsanwälte Steuerberater LLP, McDermott Will & Emery Studio Legale Associato and McDermott Will & Emery UK LLP.
You can download theMcDermottlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: McDermott
item.description: McDermott Will & Emery is an international law firm with a diversified business practice. The firm is one of the largest grossing law firms in the US and globally, and its lawyers represent a wide range of commercial, industrial and financial enterprises, both publicly and privately held. The firm consists of multiple legal entities that are coordinated through service agreements: McDermott Will & Emery LLP, McDermott Will & Emery AARPI, McDermott Will & Emery Belgium LLP, McDermott Will & Emery Rechtsanwälte Steuerberater LLP, McDermott Will & Emery Studio Legale Associato and McDermott Will & Emery UK LLP.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Norton Rose Fulbright Logo
Norton Rose Fulbright is an international law firm. It is the second largest law firm in the United States and one of the ten largest in the world, by both lawyers and revenue. In 2017/18, Norton Rose Fulbright had total revenue of US$2.1 billion. It has more than 3700 lawyers and other legal staff based in Europe, the United States, Canada, Latin America, Asia, Australia, Africa and the Middle East.
You can download theNorton Roselogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Norton Rose
item.description: Norton Rose Fulbright is an international law firm. It is the second largest law firm in the United States and one of the ten largest in the world, by both lawyers and revenue. In 2017/18, Norton Rose Fulbright had total revenue of US$2.1 billion. It has more than 3700 lawyers and other legal staff based in Europe, the United States, Canada, Latin America, Asia, Australia, Africa and the Middle East.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Orrick, Herrington & Sutcliffe Logo Orrick is an international law firm founded in San Francisco, California. The firm advises on transactions, litigation and regulatory matters for venture-backed companies, public companies, E&I funds, financial institutions and governments. Source
You can download theOrricklogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Orrick
item.description: Orrick is an international law firm founded in San Francisco, California. The firm advises on transactions, litigation and regulatory matters for venture-backed companies, public companies, E&I funds, financial institutions and governments. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Osborne Clarke Logo
Osborne Clarke is an international legal practice headquartered in London, England with offices in the United Kingdom, Germany, Italy, Belgium, Spain, Sweden, France, the Netherlands, China, India via BTG Legal, Singapore and the United States. The firm has over 270 partners and 1,600 employees spread across its 26 offices around the world. The firm’s headquarters are located in London, United Kingdom. The firm played a significant role in the development of the railways in Southern England through its historic relationship with Isambard Kingdom Brunel and the Great Western Railway.
You can download theOsborne Clarkelogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Osborne Clarke
item.description: Osborne Clarke is an international legal practice headquartered in London, England with offices in the United Kingdom, Germany, Italy, Belgium, Spain, Sweden, France, the Netherlands, China, India via BTG Legal, Singapore and the United States. The firm has over 270 partners and 1,600 employees spread across its 26 offices around the world. The firm’s headquarters are located in London, United Kingdom. The firm played a significant role in the development of the railways in Southern England through its historic relationship with Isambard Kingdom Brunel and the Great Western Railway.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Perkins Coie Logo
Perkins Coie is an international law firm headquartered in Seattle, Washington, United States, and founded in 1912. Recognized as an Am Law 50 firm, it is the largest law firm headquartered in the Pacific Northwest and has 20 offices across the United States and in China and Taiwan. The firm provides corporate, commercial litigation, intellectual property, and regulatory legal advice to a broad range of clients, including many large technology companies like Google, Twitter, Intel, Facebook, and Amazon.
You can download thePerkins Coielogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Perkins Coie
item.description: Perkins Coie is an international law firm headquartered in Seattle, Washington, United States, and founded in 1912. Recognized as an Am Law 50 firm, it is the largest law firm headquartered in the Pacific Northwest and has 20 offices across the United States and in China and Taiwan. The firm provides corporate, commercial litigation, intellectual property, and regulatory legal advice to a broad range of clients, including many large technology companies like Google, Twitter, Intel, Facebook, and Amazon.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Pinsent Masons Logo
Pinsent Masons LLP is an international law firm which specialises in the energy, infrastructure, financial services, real estate and advanced manufacturing and technology sectors. The firm ranks among the top hundred law firms in the world by turnover. Pinsent Masons LLP has over 400 partners, a total legal team of around 1,800 people and more than 2,500 staff. More than 500 of the firm’s staff are based in its international headquarters in the City of London.
You can download thePinsent Masonslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Pinsent Masons
item.description: Pinsent Masons LLP is an international law firm which specialises in the energy, infrastructure, financial services, real estate and advanced manufacturing and technology sectors. The firm ranks among the top hundred law firms in the world by turnover. Pinsent Masons LLP has over 400 partners, a total legal team of around 1,800 people and more than 2,500 staff. More than 500 of the firm’s staff are based in its international headquarters in the City of London.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Proskauer Logo
Proskauer Rose LLP is an international law firm headquartered in New York City. The firm was founded in 1875 and currently employs more than 725 attorneys in twelve offices worldwide. Proskauer is known for its labor and employment, litigation, corporate, private equity, private investment funds, finance, and intellectual property law departments. The firm is often in the headlines for its sports law group and celebrity clientele. Proskauer has long been the primary outside law firm for the National Basketball Association.
You can download theProskauerlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Proskauer
item.description: Proskauer Rose LLP is an international law firm headquartered in New York City. The firm was founded in 1875 and currently employs more than 725 attorneys in twelve offices worldwide. Proskauer is known for its labor and employment, litigation, corporate, private equity, private investment funds, finance, and intellectual property law departments. The firm is often in the headlines for its sports law group and celebrity clientele. Proskauer has long been the primary outside law firm for the National Basketball Association.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Seyfarth Shaw Logo
Seyfarth Shaw LLP is an international AmLaw 100 law firm headquartered in Chicago, Illinois. Founded in Chicago in 1945 by Henry Seyfarth, Lee Shaw, and Owen Fairweather, Seyfarth Shaw originally focused on the area of labor and employment law. Today, the firm’s clients include over 300 of the Fortune 500 companies, and its practice reflects virtually every industry and segment of the economy. Seyfarth Shaw has been recognized as one of the most innovative law firms in the nation for its implementation of “Seyfarth Lean,” a unique client service model that combines the principles of Lean Six Sigma with robust technology, knowledge management, process management techniques, alternative fee structures, and practical tools.
You can download theSeyfarth Shawlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Seyfarth Shaw
item.description: Seyfarth Shaw LLP is an international AmLaw 100 law firm headquartered in Chicago, Illinois. Founded in Chicago in 1945 by Henry Seyfarth, Lee Shaw, and Owen Fairweather, Seyfarth Shaw originally focused on the area of labor and employment law. Today, the firm’s clients include over 300 of the Fortune 500 companies, and its practice reflects virtually every industry and segment of the economy. Seyfarth Shaw has been recognized as one of the most innovative law firms in the nation for its implementation of “Seyfarth Lean,” a unique client service model that combines the principles of Lean Six Sigma with robust technology, knowledge management, process management techniques, alternative fee structures, and practical tools.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Sheppard, Mullin, Richter & Hampton Logo
Sheppard, Mullin, Richter & Hampton LLP, often abbreviated as Sheppard Mullin, is an international law firm with over 950 attorneys located in North America, Europe, and Asia. Founded and continuously operated since 1927, the firm includes 10 major practice areas ranging from Antitrust to Tax. The firm additionally includes industry-focused teams such as Entertainment, Healthcare, Privacy & Security, and others. Since its founding, the firm’s headquarters has remained in Los Angeles, California.
You can download theSheppard Mullinlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Sheppard Mullin
item.description: Sheppard, Mullin, Richter & Hampton LLP, often abbreviated as Sheppard Mullin, is an international law firm with over 950 attorneys located in North America, Europe, and Asia. Founded and continuously operated since 1927, the firm includes 10 major practice areas ranging from Antitrust to Tax. The firm additionally includes industry-focused teams such as Entertainment, Healthcare, Privacy & Security, and others. Since its founding, the firm’s headquarters has remained in Los Angeles, California.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Sidley Austin Logo Sidley Austin LLP, is an international law firm, employing approximately 2,000 lawyers in 20 offices worldwide. The firm’s headquarters is at One South Dearborn in Chicago’s Loop. The firm specializes in a variety of areas in both litigation and corporate practices. Source
You can download theSidley Austinlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Squire Patton Boggs Logo
Squire Patton Boggs is an international law firm with 42 offices in 20 countries. It was formed in 2014 by the merger of multinational law firm Squire Sanders with Washington, D.C. based Patton Boggs. It is one of the 30 largest law firms in the world by total headcount and gross revenue, twelfth largest firm in the UK by revenue, and one of the top 15 by number of countries occupied.
You can download theSquire Patton Boggslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >

item.description: Squire Patton Boggs is an international law firm with 42 offices in 20 countries. It was formed in 2014 by the merger of multinational law firm Squire Sanders with Washington, D.C. based Patton Boggs. It is one of the 30 largest law firms in the world by total headcount and gross revenue, twelfth largest firm in the UK by revenue, and one of the top 15 by number of countries occupied.

Steptoe & Johnson Logo Steptoe & Johnson LLP is an international law firm headquartered in Washington, D.C. with offices in New York City, Los Angeles, Chicago, San Francisco, London, Brussels, Beijing, and Hong Kong. Source

item.title: Steptoe
item.description: Steptoe & Johnson LLP is an international law firm headquartered in Washington, D.C. with offices in New York City, Los Angeles, Chicago, San Francisco, London, Brussels, Beijing, and Hong Kong. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Taylor Wessing Logo Taylor Wessing LLP is an international law firm with 28 offices internationally. The firm has over 300 partners and over 1000 lawyers worldwide. The company was formed as a result of a merger of the British law firm Taylor Joynson Garrett and the German law firm Wessing & Berenberg-Gossler, retaining the first name of each. Source
You can download theTaylor Wessinglogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Taylor Wessing
item.description: Taylor Wessing LLP is an international law firm with 28 offices internationally. The firm has over 300 partners and over 1000 lawyers worldwide. The company was formed as a result of a merger of the British law firm Taylor Joynson Garrett and the German law firm Wessing & Berenberg-Gossler, retaining the first name of each. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Vinson & Elkins Logo Vinson & Elkins LLP is an international law firm with approximately 700 lawyers worldwide headquartered in Downtown Houston, Texas. The firm has offices in major energy, financial, and political centers worldwide, including Austin, Dallas, Dubai, Houston, London, Los Angeles, New York City, Richmond, Riyadh, San Francisco, Tokyo, and Washington, D.C. Source
You can download theVinson and Elkinslogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Vinson and Elkins
item.description: Vinson & Elkins LLP is an international law firm with approximately 700 lawyers worldwide headquartered in Downtown Houston, Texas. The firm has offices in major energy, financial, and political centers worldwide, including Austin, Dallas, Dubai, Houston, London, Los Angeles, New York City, Richmond, Riyadh, San Francisco, Tokyo, and Washington, D.C. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Weil, Gotshal & Manges Logo Weil, Gotshal & Manges LLP is an American international law firm with over 1,000 attorneys, headquartered in New York City. With a gross annual revenue in excess of $1.1 billion, it is among the world’s largest law firms according to The American Lawyer’s AmLaw 100 survey. Source
You can download theWeillogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Weil
item.description: Weil, Gotshal & Manges LLP is an American international law firm with over 1,000 attorneys, headquartered in New York City. With a gross annual revenue in excess of $1.1 billion, it is among the world’s largest law firms according to The American Lawyer’s AmLaw 100 survey. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 White & Case Logo
White & Case LLP is an international law firm based in New York City. Founded in 1901, the firm has 45 offices in 31 countries worldwide. White & Case is one of the top ten law firms worldwide in terms of revenue. The firm has expanded beyond New York, opening offices in leading cities in the US and around the world, and it has practice groups in emerging markets including Latin America, Central and Eastern Europe, Africa, the Middle East and Asia.
You can download theWhite and Caselogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: White and Case
item.description: White & Case LLP is an international law firm based in New York City. Founded in 1901, the firm has 45 offices in 31 countries worldwide. White & Case is one of the top ten law firms worldwide in terms of revenue. The firm has expanded beyond New York, opening offices in leading cities in the US and around the world, and it has practice groups in emerging markets including Latin America, Central and Eastern Europe, Africa, the Middle East and Asia.
